caption.p: The effects of SZC on body weight, diarrhea, and thymus/spleen indexes in mice with CID ( n = 8, male/femal = 4). ( a) Experimental process of CID. ( b) The daily-changed body weight of each group. ( c) The daily-changed diarrhea rate of each group. ( d) Thymus and spleen indexes of each group. Data were presented as means ± SEM. * P < 0.05 and ** P < 0.01 compared with model, # P < 0.05 and ## P < 0.01 compared with control
